forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers this morning with overcast skies during the afternoon hours. High 12C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain...mainly in the morning. High 54F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain developing after midnight. Low 7C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain developing after midnight. Low 44F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 12C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 53F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 7C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. Low near 45F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming partly cloudy after some morning light rain. High 12C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early. A mix of sun and clouds in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low around 5C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 42F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine in the morning with more clouds for later in the day. High around 15C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some sun in the morning with increasing clouds during the afternoon. High 59F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High near 15C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 59F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 9C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 48F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High near 55F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 6C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 43F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 17C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High 63F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 9C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 48F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 17C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine in the morning with more clouds for later in the day. High 63F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy late. Low around 10C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low 49F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Abundant sunshine. High 18C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 64F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 9C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 47F. Winds NE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High near 20C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 66F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 8C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 47F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
